name: summarise
constraint: (declare-const CO_SPEC Int)(declare-const CI_SPEC Int)(declare-const RO_SPEC Int)(declare-const RI_SPEC Int)(assert (>= 3 CO_SPEC))(assert (<= RO_SPEC RI_SPEC))(assert (<= CO_SPEC (+ 1 CI_SPEC)))
(declare-const RO_SPEC Int)(declare-const IG_SPEC Int)(declare-const OG_SPEC Int)(assert (= IG_SPEC OG_SPEC))(assert (= OG_SPEC RO_SPEC))
(declare-const IH_SPEC Int)(declare-const OH_SPEC Int)(assert (>= (+ IH_SPEC 1) OH_SPEC))(assert (> OH_SPEC 0))
(declare-const IC_SPEC Int)(declare-const IG_SPEC Int)(declare-const OC_SPEC Int)(assert (>= (+ IC_SPEC 1 IG_SPEC) OC_SPEC))
